alfredsnippet.snippet:
folder_dir={clipboard}
find "$folder_dir" -type f -name "*.srt" | sort | while read srt_file; do
    if [[ -f "$srt_file" ]]; then
        txt_file="${srt_file%.srt}.txt"
        
        awk '/^[0-9]+/ { next }/^[0-9]{2}:[0-9]{2}:[0-9]{2}/ { next }/^.+/ { print }' "$srt_file" > "$txt_file"
    fi
done


parent_dir=$(dirname "$folder_dir")
file_name=$(basename "$folder_dir")
output_file="${parent_dir}/${file_name}.md"

find "$folder_dir" -type f -name "*.txt" | sort | while read file; do
    if [ -f "$file" ]; then
        echo "正在处理: $file"
        echo "文件名: $(basename "$file")" >> "$output_file"
        echo "------------------------" >> "$output_file"
        cat "$file" >> "$output_file"
        echo -e "\n\n" >> "$output_file"
    fi
done

echo "所有 txt 文件已合并到 $output_file"
alfredsnippet.name: merge SRT to MD in folder
